dataset.sql: select * from( select t.id,t.name,t.service_type,t.cover,nvl(t.collect_count,0)as collect_count,nvl(t.watch_count,0) as watch_count,vci.up_time,vci.if_shelves,nvl(vci.serial_number,10000000)as sewrial_number,vci.if_login from v_vms_video_countprop t,vms_cast_info vci where t.id = vci.id and vci.if_shelves='1' order by serial_number asc,watch_count desc,vci.up_time desc ) where rownum<6
